references.paper_title: With malice toward none: Assessing uncertainty via equalized coverage
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of equalized coverage in conformal inference, which is the central focus and key contribution of the current paper.
This foundational paper on conformal prediction sets provides the theoretical basis for the methods used and extended in the current work.

references.paper_title: Algorithmic learning in a random world
references.reason: This book is a comprehensive introduction to conformal prediction, laying the groundwork for many of the concepts and techniques used in the current research.

references.paper_title: Classification with valid and adaptive coverage
references.reason: This paper develops a conformal inference method with adaptive coverage, which is directly related to and builds upon by the current work.
This paper provides important context on algorithmic fairness, which is a key motivation and consideration in the development of the proposed method.
